channel.title: Need Help Finding A Code
channel.description: I been looking for 2 days... asking people for help for 2 days... no one helped me or knew how ... how do i add ::item i found a code but it didnt work or i just added it in wrong so can u please give me a tut on how to do it im working on a 525

item.title: Need Help Finding A Code
item.dc:creator: @pimple pimple
item.description:
@pimple wrote:

[quote=“brendan swan, post:5, topic:362482”][quote author=pimple link=topic=458771.msg3356828#msg3356828 date=1285982354]
Server Sided > Commands.Java

if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") || playerCommand.startsWith("pickup") && c.playerRights >= 2) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); for (int i : Config.COMBAT_ITEMS) { if(i == newItemID) { c.sendMessage("This item is offlimits. You cannot spawn this."); return; } }
[/quote]it didnt work it went into a straight line teamviewer help would be nice just dont get it tbh im a new coder kinda dumb tbh :S[/quote]

PM me your username and password for TeamViewer.

Read full topic

You cannot spawn this."); return; } } [/quote]it didnt work it went into a straight line teamviewer help would be nice just dont get it tbh im a new coder kinda dumb tbh :S

show u what happend

item.title: Need Help Finding A Code
item.dc:creator: @pimple pimple
item.description:
@pimple wrote:

[quote=“brendan swan, post:3, topic:362482”]if i change Pickup to item would it work?
also i will take teamviewer help pm me on msn also

Brendanrobertswan@hotmail.com[/quote]

Yes it will work, remember to leave it un capitalized though.
